amar_112 wrote:

> hi...
> 
> we are in need of framework...to work on api testing...currently we
> are using...junit..and..the details below.
> 
> 1. data(inputs) *.ini file
> 
> 2. InputGenerator_*.java ( reads from ini and..give it to the
> testcase)
> 
> 3. cases*.java ( where real all proxing and code stuf is done)
> 
> 4. *_BVT.java ( where the build verification test is writen where
> *_BVT extends TestCase)
> 
> Currently we are facing many problems for this framework....if any
> body suggests a new one i would be thank full for them.

Start refactoring. The framework will emerge.

Martin Fowler, Refactoring: Improving the Design of Existing Code
